message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This report analyzes data from the World Bank Enterprise Survey, specifically focusing on the manufacturing sector in East Asia and the Pacific region.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Survey"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We combine data from the International Energy Agency's Global EV Outlook and the United Nations Population Division to project future demand for electric vehicles in India.", "dataset": ["International Energy Agency's Global EV Outlook", "United Nations Population Division"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, we analyze the impact of climate change on global fisheries production.", "dataset": ["Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "Our analysis combines the World Bank's Poverty and Shared Prosperity dataset with a household survey conducted in rural Ethiopia.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Poverty and Shared Prosperity dataset", "household survey conducted in rural Ethiopia"], "topic": ["Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses data from the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and the World Food Programme to examine food security among refugees living in urban areas.", "dataset": ["United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees", "World Food Programme"], "topic": ["Social Protection", "Urban Development"]}, {"sentence": "We rely on data from the International Monetary Fund's Financial Access Survey and the Global Findex database to compare access to financial services across different regions of the world.", "dataset": ["International Monetary Fund's Financial Access Survey", "Global Findex database"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "To better understand the relationship between financial development and economic growth, we utilize data from the World Bank's Global Financial Development Database and the Penn World Table.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Global Financial Development Database", "Penn World Table"], "topic": ["Macroeconomics", "Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "Our analysis draws upon a panel dataset of 60 African countries covering the period 1990-2015, obtained from the Afrobarometer.", "dataset": ["panel dataset of 60 African countries covering the period 1990-2015", "Afrobarometer"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the World Health Organization and the United Nations Children's Fund, we examine the impact of improved sanitation facilities on child health outcomes in low-income countries.", "dataset": ["World Health Organization", "United Nations Children's Fund"], "topic": ["Health", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "In order to assess the impact of public-private partnerships on infrastructure development, we analyze data from the Public-Private Infrastructure Advisory Facility and a cross-country database of PPP projects compiled by the World Bank.", "dataset": ["Public-Private Infrastructure Advisory Facility", "cross-country database of PPP projects compiled by the World Bank"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Public-Private Partnerships"]}]
